TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit SamlStatement extends System.Object

summary.span: 表示 安全性權杖的宣告。

span.span: Represents a claim for a security token.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 安全性權杖會使用 SAML 判斷提示 (Assertion) 來指定其宣告，而這種判斷指示可指定何時驗證此主體。 security tokens specify their claims using SAML assertions, which can specify when the subject was authenticated. 在 SAML 判斷提示中的宣告是以 SAML 陳述式表示，而這些陳述式則由 類別表示。The claims in a SAML assertion are represented by SAML statements, which are represented by the class. SAML 規格會定義下列陳述式型別：The SAML specification defines the following statement types: - - - -

span.span: Creates an authorization policy for a security token.

summary.span: 使得這個執行個體成為唯讀的。

span.span: Causes this instance to be read-only.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當呼叫 方法時， 屬性會設定為 `true`，而且將無法再設定這個執行個體的屬性。When the method is called, the property is set to `true` and properties of this instance can no longer be set.

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, reads the SAML statement from the specified XML reader.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 方法，讀取 SAML 陳述式中的內容、驗證 XML，然後設定對應至屬性 (Attribute) 和項目的適當屬性 (Property)。Use the method to read in a SAML statement, validate the XML, and set the appropriate properties that correspond to the attributes and elements.
